revised_title: The Optical Properties and Advantages of Vitreous Silica for Optical Work
tldr: The authors investigate the optical properties of vitreous silica, finding it to have a low refractive index, greater dispersion than quartz, and excellent transparency to ultraviolet radiation. They also demonstrate its potential as a standard glass for optical work due to its homogeneity, resistance to corrosion, and lack of foreign particles.
